mapper.select: SELECT t1.Table_Name tableName, t3.comments tableCom, t1.Column_Name colName, t2.Comments colCom, t1.DATA_TYPE dataType, t1.DATA_LENGTH length, t1.NullAble nullAble FROM cols t1 LEFT JOIN user_col_comments t2 ON t1.Table_name = t2.Table_name AND t1.Column_Name = t2.Column_Name LEFT JOIN user_tab_comments t3 ON t1.Table_name = t3.Table_name LEFT JOIN user_objects t4 ON t1.table_name = t4.OBJECT_NAME WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT t4.Object_Name FROM User_objects t4 WHERE t4.Object_Type = 'TABLE' AND t4.Temporary = 'Y' AND t4.Object_Name = t1.Table_Name) and not regexp_like(t1.TABLE_NAME, '[=]') and lower(t1.table_name) in ('t1_cust_info','th_cust_trans_log') ORDER BY t1.Table_Name, t1.Column_ID
